<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">

  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE2068</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Spatial Abilities of High -School Students in the Perception of a Geologic Structure</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Räumliche Fähigkeiten der Höhe - 
Schule-Kursteilnehmer in der Vorstellung einer geologischen Struktur</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Capacités spatiales de haute - étudiants 
d'école dans la perception d'une structure géologique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Abilidades spatial da elevação - estudantes da 
escola na percepção de uma estrutura geologic</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Abilità spaziali del high - allievi della scuola 
nella percezione di una struttura geologica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χωρικές δυνατότητες υψηλού - σχολικοί σπουδαστές στην
αντίληψη για μια γεωλογική δομή</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Capacidades espaciales del colmo - estudiantes de 
la escuela en la opinión de una estructura geológica</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">This article discusses the importance of spatial abilities to students in various sciences where thinking in three dimensios is all important., and characterises the spacial abilities necessary for this.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">spatial abilities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">3-D structures</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">geology</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Dieser Artikel behandelt den Wert der räumlichen 
Fähigkeiten zu den Kursteilnehmern in den verschiedenen 
Wissenschaften, in denen das Denken in drei dimensios ganz wichtig 
ist, und kennzeichnet die spacial Fähigkeiten, die für dieses 
notwendig sind.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Cet article discute l'importance des capacités 
spatiales aux étudiants dans diverses sciences où la pensée dans 
trois dimensios est très importante, et caractérise les capacités 
spacial nécessaires pour ceci.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Este artigo discute a importância de abilidades 
spatial aos estudantes nas várias ciências onde pensar em três 
dimensios é toda importante, e caracteriza as abilidades spacial 
necessárias para esta.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Questo articolo discute l'importanza delle 
abilità spaziali agli allievi in varie scienze dove pensare in tre 
dimensios è tutto l'importante e caratterizza le abilità spacial 
necessarie per questa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Αυτό το άρθρο συζητά τη σημασία των χωρικών 
δυνατοτήτων στους σπουδαστές στις διάφορες επιστήμες όπου η 
σκέψη σε τρία dimensios είναι όλα σημαντική, και χαρακτηρίζει
τις spacial δυνατότητες απαραίτητες για αυτό.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Este artículo discute la importancia de 
capacidades espaciales a los estudiantes en varias ciencias donde 
está todo importante el pensamiento en tres dimensios, y caracteriza 
las capacidades spacial necesarias para esto.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">räumliche Fähigkeiten</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Strukturen 3-D</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">capacités spatiales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">structures 3-D</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">géologie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">abilidades spatial</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">estruturas 3-D</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">abilità spaziali</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">strutture 3-D</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">geologia</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">χωρικές δυνατότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">τρισδιάστατες δομές</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωλογία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">capacidades espaciales</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">estructuras 3-D</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">geología</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
